list.name: Aimie C: Teacher
list.about: I am Aimie, an English teacher from the UK with over 5 years of teaching experience in the UK, Vietnam, and Thailand. I look forward to meeting you and accompanying you on your journey to improve your English skills!

reviews.name: Minh T.
reviews.content: Ms. Aimie teaches very enthusiastically and clearly. Authentic British accent!

workshops.title: Basic Communication for Beginners
workshops.description: Workshop to improve basic listening and speaking reflexes.

workshops.title: IELTS Writing Strategies
workshops.description: Focus on structure and ideas for Task 1 & 2.

list.name: My Quyên: Teacher
list.language: Fluent in Chinese, native Vietnamese speaker
list.about: I am My Quyên, a teacher from Taiwan with over 3 years of experience teaching Vietnamese and foreign students. I focus on helping students speak English naturally and confidently.

reviews.name: Thu N.
reviews.content: Very clear explanations, gentle, and dedicated!

list.name: Leo N: Teacher
list.about: I am Leo, an English teacher with a standard British accent. I have 5 years of teaching experience and am fluent in both English and French as native languages.

items.title: Reputable Teachers - Quality Commitment
items.desc: Experienced native instructors with certifications, inspiring you to improve after every lesson.

items.title: Fun & Effective Learning
items.desc: From daily conversations to exam preparation, practical lessons with high interaction tailored to personal goals.

items.title: Flexible Learning for Busy People
items.desc: Students and office workers can easily learn according to their personal schedules.

items.title: 1-1 Learning Your Way, With Your Chosen Teacher
items.desc: Join online trial lessons to find the teacher that suits you best.

items.name: Phương Nghi
items.content: The website is easy to use, loads quickly, has a great interface, and online learning is very convenient without leaving home. The curriculum is personalized to the right level, no pressure or constraints. What I like most is the flexible schedule, suitable even for busy students like me.

items.name: Nhi Nguyễn
items.content: The British teacher pronounces very accurately, corrects mistakes carefully, and always focuses on quality rather than targets. Ms. Aimie is friendly, explains clearly, and is especially patient with slow learners like me. After a while, I am confident speaking English much better.

items.name: Mỹ Mỹ
items.content: At first, I was quite worried about my English speaking ability, but thanks to the practical program and dedicated teachers, I have improved significantly. The topics are diverse and easy to apply in daily life. The teacher corrects pronunciation in detail for each word, creating a comfortable feeling when practicing speaking. Thanks to the center for helping me gain confidence in communication every day.

cta.title: Start your language learning journey today!
cta.desc: Get free consultation from our professional student support team.
